title: Term
description: The JSON schema representation of a ontology term.

def.description: The definition of this term (in short sentences).

comment.description: A comment regarding this term and its usage, properties, ...

synonym.description: An alternate name of this term.

xref.description: A cross-reference to another term from another ontology with the same or an analogous meaning.

is_a.description: A reference to the to the class this term is an instance of.

is_anonymous.description: Whether or not this term has an anonymous id.

subset.description: The term subset this term belongs to.

intersection_of.description: The terms of which this term is the intersection of, given as TANs.

union_of.description: The terms of which this term is the union of, given as TANs.

disjoint_from.description: The terms of which this term is disjoint from, given as TANs.

relationship.description: The type of relationship of this term to another one. This other term is defined via its TAN.

is_obsolete.description: Whether or not this term is obsolete.

replaced_by.description: The TAN of the term this term is replaced by.

consider.description: The TAN of a term that could be a good replacement for this term. Should be carefully reviewed by a domain-specific expert.

builtin.description: Whether or not this term is built in to the OBO format.
